A11yPermission.checkBoxText: Enda zvakananga kuti ubvumidze mukati mehafu pamwedzi uye haisisiri kuratidza iyi hwindo
A11yPermission.content: Iri basa rinoda kubvumidzwa kwebetsero. Kana iwe uchida kupa mvumo, ndapota tinya [OK]. Kana iwe uchida kukanda mapfumo pasi, ndapota tinya [kudzima]
A11yPermission.title: Mvumo yekushandisa

floatPermission.checkBoxText: Enda zvakananga kuti ubvumidze mukati mehafu pamwedzi uye haisisiri kuratidza iyi hwindo
floatPermission.content: Iri basa rinoda kubvumidzwa kweiyo inoyerera hwindo rewindo. Kana iwe uchida kupa mvumo, ndapota tinya [OK]. Kana iwe uchida kukanda mapfumo pasi, ndapota tinya [kudzima]
floatPermission.title: Mvumo yekushandisa
